original_title: UFC Fight Night 131: Rivera vs. Moraes
overview: UFC Fight Night 131: Rivera vs. Moraes was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that was held on June 1, 2018, at Adirondack Bank Center in Utica, New York. A bantamweight bout between Jimmie Rivera and former WSOF Bantamweight Champion Marlon Moraes served as the event headliner.
title: UFC Fight Night 131: Rivera vs. Moraes
